isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - WINDSHIELD WASHER BOTTLE WITH PUMP MOTOR

svcproc.title: WINDSHIELD WASHER BOTTLE WITH PUMP MOTOR

svcsubproc.title: Remove Windshield Washer Bottle with Pump Motor on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 93 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: The washer bottle (Item 1) and pump motor (Item 2) are located on the passenger side frame rail (Item 11) just behind the bumper. Use the following steps to remove washer bottle and pump motor.
To remove the washer bottle (Item 1) with pump motor (Item 2) as a unit, follow the procedures below.
Disconnect wiring harness connector (Item 3) from pump motor (Item 2).
Disconnect wiring harness connector (Item 4) from the low fluid sensor (Item 5).
Remove windshield washer hose (Item 6) from pump motor outlet port (Item 7).
Cut two Ty-wraps (Item 8) Securing wiring harness to washer bottle (Item 1).

Remove two hex head sems bolts (Item 9) and two hex flanged nuts (Item 10) securing washer bottle with pump motor (Items 1 and 2) to the passenger side frame rail (Item 11). Save washer bottle with pump motor and hex head sems bolts and hex flanged nuts for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 93. Windshield Washer Bottle with Pump Motor on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
